courses.name: Certificate III in Commercial Cookery
courses.note: This includes 48 complete food service periods for unit SITHCCC043 - Work effectively as a cook。 Australia Institute of Business and Technology qualifications only fulfil the academic requirement, not a licensed trade qualification, traineeship or apprenticeship.

courses.name: Certificate III in Patisserie
courses.note: This includes 12 complete service periods for unit SITHCCC034 - Work effectively in a commercial kitchen。 Australia Institute of Business and Technology qualifications only fulfil the academic requirement, not a licensed trade qualification, traineeship or apprenticeship.

courses.name: Certificate IV in Kitchen Management(Fast track intensive course)
courses.note: This includes 48 complete food service periods for unit SITHCCC043 - Work effectively as a cook.Students will be required to do additional training in order to complete a fast track intensive course。 Australia Institute of Business and Technology qualifications only fulfil the academic requirement, not a licensed trade qualification, traineeship or apprenticeship.

courses.name: Certificate IV in Patisserie(Fast track intensive course)
courses.note: This includes 12 complete service periods for unit SITHCCC034 - Work effectively in a commercial kitchen.Students will be required to do additional training in order to complete a fast track intensive course.Australia Institute of Business and Technology qualifications only fulfil the academic requirement, not a licensed trade qualification, traineeship or apprenticeship.

courses.name: Diploma of Hospitality Management
courses.note: Includes 4 service periods for unit SITXCCS016 – Develop and manage quality customer service practices;Includes 36 complete service periods for unit SITHIND008 - Work effectively in hospitality service. Australia Institute of Business and Technology qualifications only fulfil the academic requirement, not a licensed trade qualification, traineeship or apprenticeship.

courses.name: Advanced Diploma of Hospitality Management
courses.note: Includes 4 service periods for unit SITXCCS016 – Develop and manage quality customer service practices;Includes 36 complete service periods for unit SITHIND008 - Work effectively in hospitality service. Australia Institute of Business and Technology qualifications only fulfil the academic requirement, not a licensed trade qualification, traineeship or apprenticeship.

courses.name: Certificate III in Commerical Cookery + Certificate IV in Kitchen Management + Diploma of Hospitality Management
courses.note: These qualifications require service periods. Please visit the individual course outlines on our website.Australia Institute of Business and Technology qualifications only fulfil the academic requirement, not a licensed trade qualification, traineeship or apprenticeship.

courses.name: Certificate IV in Kitchen Management + Advanced Diploma of Hospitality Management
courses.note: These qualifications require service periods. Please visit the individual course outlines on our website. Australia Institute of Business and Technology qualifications only fulfil the academic requirement, not a licensed trade qualification, traineeship or apprenticeship.
